item.title: Massive dog mess almost every day, 14th December
item.description:
Someone is allowing (and obviously getting away with it) their dog to do massive poos here almost every day in exactly the same spot, and I’d not clearing it up. It’s absolutely disgusting. It’s a serious health hazard given the amount of people including young kids that use the path. It’s extremely antisocial and needs addressing properly. It doesn’t just need clearing up and then ignored.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maud Cashmore Way, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still tens of illegally parked lime bikes, 13th December
item.description:
Sort this out. Lawless, amateur, ill equipped, money grabbing, fly tipping Lime have once again turned and maintained a complete mess on Charlotte rd. no e de response to the mess they make. Get them off this road. They are unable to cope. A complete disgrace. We will not wait for them. If they do sort out how to make it work they can come back… but for now get them off the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Charlotte Road, Shoreditch, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Premier Corner j/w Salusbury Way NW6, 13th December
item.description:
Major pothole just after the zebra crossing at the junction of Premier Corner and Salusbury Way NW6, on the southeast bound carriageway. Causing vehicles to either swerve dangerously to avoid or take considerable damage to the underside of their vehicle. Also aware this has been reported several times since 24/11/2025.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
